pages.title: Recipe registry
pages.text: Knowledgium researching finally gives you some useful results. The world becomes more and more understandable. With this registry you can extract information about any recipe in the world!

pages.description: Generic function to receive all recipe types registered in game

returns: List of recipe types, decoded are strings, for example $(o)minecraft:crafting$()

pages.description: Function, that allow you to search recipe for specific item. Please, take a note, then this function may work very unexpected for recipe types from another modifications

returns: Recipe representation. For minecraft recipes it will be close to json model, otherwise it can be anything, useful or not
